tool_description: Enter your text, and watch the API respond with a completion that attempts to match the context or pattern you provided. Using latest model from OpenAI is GPT 4
name: Simple ChatGPT API
title: Simple ChatGPT API

api_list.name: Enter your question and get response
api_list.description: With this endpoint, users can send their questions to the chatbot, in return receiving a text string response from the bot. This feature is especially handy for integrating the chatbot into applications or websites that require swift and precise answers to user queries.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-chatgpt-api.p.rapidapi.com/ask"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-chatgpt-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-chatgpt-api.p.rapidapi.com/ask"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-chatgpt-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
